arts.ttl: Stoke City player ratings vs Plymouth as Mark Robins has to find way to solve familiar problem
arts.sum: Mark Robins saw Stoke City struggle to find a way to break down Plymouth Argyle as he starts his new job with a goalless home draw. Cannon couldn’t tap when Tchamadeu crossed after linking with Koumas, Ashley Phillips couldn't force home a set piece - and a late melee came so late that the full-time whistle blew before it played out.

arts.ttl: Mark Robins begins Stoke reign with draw against Plymouth
Wayne Rooney tipped for Man Utd role after brutal sacking and 'big-money offer'
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney, who was sacked by Plymouth on New Year's Eve, should consider a role as specialist striker coach for Manchester United according to former team-mate West Brown

arts.ttl: John Coates sends 'new dynasty' message as Mark Robins makes Stoke City bow
arts.sum: "As we prepare to welcome supporters to the bet365 Stadium for the first time this year, we will do so with renewed optimism following the appointment of Mark Robins as our new manager. Stoke City chairman and owner John Coates has sent a message to supporters following the appointment of Mark Robins as manager.

arts.ttl: Stoke vs Plymouth live news, action and reaction as Mark Robins takes charge
arts.sum: He has been joined at Stoke by England under-20s lead coach Paul Nevin and Wales assistant manager James Rowberry, while Alex Morris is staying on as first team coach and Darren Behcet is returning to his role as goalkeeper coach. “I spoke with Paul on a number of occasions and I’ve met James previously and know he’s a really good coach, really good coach and coach educator as well, lead coach himself on the grass and he’s done a lot of work with the Welsh FA and currently working with Craig Bellamy in the Wales national team as well.

arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney the manager can’t escape his man-cave or his luminous teenage past | Barney Ronay
arts.sum: His managerial ability remains unproven, but the old-school energy Rooney represents ensures he is still fondly regarded Re-centre your de-centred centre. Thirty-seven new year wellbeing tips on how to simplify your wellbeing tips. I lost seven inches of neck fat without visiting a gym, changing my diet or having any neck fat to begin with. The problem with this kind of new year newspaper stuff, the endless weekend articles about how to make yourself feel better, is that it is usually quite complicated. There is a need to understand things, balance your energies, interact with a baffling digital world. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: How Mark Robins can guarantee a thunderous support at Stoke City
arts.sum: We will get to know the style he wants to go with soon enough and, as a former Manchester United player, that’s a good starting point. Hello and good luck to Mark Robins as he takes on the big job at Stoke City.

arts.ttl: Plymouth break transfer record to sign Baidoo
arts.sum: Plymouth Argyle sign Ghana midfielder Michael Baidoo for an undisclosed club-record fee from Swedish side Elfsborg.

arts.ttl: Plymouth Argyle agreement to sign long term target – Player now in England
arts.sum: There’s a claim in the Swedish media that Elfsborg midfielder Michael Baidoo is on the verge signing for Plymouth Argyle. The Ghanian was linked with a move to the Championship side in recent months and January always looked like a prime time for the deal to happen. arts.ttl: Stoke vs Plymouth predictions: Robins can get a Potters response
arts.sum: Stoke take on Plymouth in the Championship on Saturday and Dan Childs fancies the home side to register a comfortable victory.
